H0.text: What is the name given to something used to compress an artery to control bleeding. Hemostat

H1.text: What is the name given to something used to compress an artery to control bleeding. Arterial Clamp

H2.text: What is the name given to something used to compress an artery to control bleeding. Compression Band

H3.text: What is the name given to something used to compress an artery to control bleeding. Torniquet

A4.text: A hemostat is a tool used to control bleeding during surgery.

A5.text: Hemostats are used to clamp exposed blood vessels shut.
